creator: claude@renegat.net
text:
When specified from within the server.xml file, the Context element appears to expect the following syntax for its Path attribute:

  /location

If the leading '/' is omitted, the log shows lots of:

   Failed to process JAR [jar:jndi:/...lib.jar!/null] for TLD files

which isn't very explicit...

I can't reproduce this. If this is still a problem in 7.0.11 onwards, please feel free to re-open and add the steps to reproduce it.

It did improve the handling of invalid context paths and that will be in 7.0.12 onwards.
